sentences.en: A skeptical expression came over my mouth.
sentences.cn: 我嘴边流露出一丝怀疑.

sentences.en: As much as we would like to have the remains of actual dinosaur tissue, there are sound reasons for being skeptical of the identifications made in the reading.
sentences.cn: 尽管我们都希望这些化石是真正的恐龙组织，但是还是有一些很有说服力的理由让我们怀疑阅读部分的发现。

sentences.en: Cleveland appeared skeptical, but he hung up the telephone.
sentences.cn: 克里费兰好象有点不相信, 但他还是挂上了电话.

sentences.en: Environmental groups are skeptical of the government’s claims.
sentences.cn: 环境保护组织对政府的声明持怀疑态度。

sentences.en: He is highly skeptical of the reforms.
sentences.cn: 他对改革持极度怀疑的态度。

sentences.en: Her look was skeptical and resigned.
sentences.cn: 她的表情是将信将疑而又无可奈何.

sentences.en: Her tone is skeptical and detached.
sentences.cn: 她的声音是怀疑的,冷漠的.

sentences.en: I am skeptical of ideas of God and faith in religion.
sentences.cn: 我怀疑神的概念以及对宗教的信仰.

sentences.en: I think going in they were very skeptical we would get to this point given our history in Seattle.
sentences.cn: 我想鉴于西雅图过去的历史，在开始的时候他们对我们能达到这个地步还是有怀疑的。

sentences.en: I’m extremely skeptical about what I read in the press.
sentences.cn: 我对报纸上读到的东西极度怀疑。

sentences.en: L.M.:Well, I was skeptical myself in the beginning. But these are facts. The findings are very reproducible and we are waiting for confirmation by other labs.
sentences.cn: 大爷：我老人家一开始也是很怀疑的。但是这个是事实。这个发现可以被反复验证，我们正在等待别的实验是的验证。

sentences.en: Many were skeptical about this solution.
sentences.cn: 许多人对这一解决办法表示怀疑.

sentences.en: Markings suggested that it came from Germany, but authorities were skeptical.
sentences.cn: 标记显示,牙膏产自德国, 但当局对此表示怀疑.

sentences.en: Not all theory that we read in this course is skeptical.
sentences.cn: 我们在这门课中提及的理论不全是怀疑性的。

sentences.en: Others here are more skeptical about the chances for justice being done.
sentences.cn: 这里的其他人更为怀疑正义能否得到伸张。

sentences.en: Senator Lugar is skeptical that Congress will appropriate more funding for this purpose.
sentences.cn: 参议员卢格怀疑国会是否会拨出更多资金用于此目的。

sentences.en: So how do we strengthen our skeptical skills?
sentences.cn: 那么，我们如何加强自身的怀疑技能呢？

sentences.en: The neo - Keynesiano are skeptical of the new claim.
sentences.cn: 新凯恩斯学派对这一新说法持怀疑态度.

sentences.en: The President was the most skeptical.
sentences.cn: 总统是持最强烈怀疑态度的.

sentences.en: These skeptical scientists wrote reports that sounded more like fiction than fact.
sentences.cn: 这批心存疑窦的科学家写成的报告,读来倒像是小说而不像是事实.

sentences.en: They are skeptical about how much will be accomplished by legislation.
sentences.cn: 他们对于立法成效心存疑虑。

sentences.en: They shared a skeptical assessment of Soviet motivations.
sentences.cn: 他们都以怀疑的态度看待苏联的背后动机.

sentences.en: Though this is a skeptical age, and our faith has weakened, our confidence in some aspects of the traditional culture should and would never be lost.
sentences.cn: 尽管这是一个怀疑的时代，我们的信心削弱了，我们的信心在某些方面的传统文化应该也不会丢失。

sentences.en: Your empty promises are lost on the skeptical consumer.
sentences.cn: 你的空头承诺对于多疑的客户来说毫无用处.

words.tran_cn: 怀疑论者；怀疑者；无神论者
怀疑的；怀疑论的，不可知论的

trans.tran_cn: 怀疑性的，好怀疑的，<口>无神论的
trans.tran_en: tending to disagree with what other people tell you
